body:
Is it really possible to travel in Europe on $30 (â‚¬23) a day? Absolutely! I've done it twice. I went for a month in May 2006 and another month in September 2011. Both trips cost me less than $1,000 total (excluding travel costs). 

This handy book will help you plan the trip of a lifetime, save money and navigate through Europe like a pro! You've got questions, this book has answers.



### Authors and Contributors
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: Broke backpacker
